concept.title: Dataset Destinations
concept.shortdesc: Datasets can be exported to consuming applications and tools.

conbody.p: Dataset destinations and data source connections are configured initially based on the parameters of the connection type (ODBC, FTP, and JSON-REST).

A subset of the elements produced by Data Processing Functions are selected to define a dataset that will be materialized in HANA. The chosen Access Policies determine the data representation (e.g. identified or de-identified) that is persisted in HANA.
